title: Neanderthal (Caveman)
description: Squat, powerful, primitive demihumans with ape-like faces. Dwell in caverns and hunt cave bears. Shy of contact with humans (with whom they are related), but friendly with dwarves and gnomes.
extras: Weapons: Prefer stone axes, stone hammers, clubs, or spears.	Leaders: Two 6HD leaders (one male, one female) live in the neanderthal lair. They are 10’ tall and of a related but distinct race.	Racial animosity: Attack ogres on sight. Hate goblins and kobolds.	Pets: Sometimes keep white apes as pets (see Ape, White).
